name: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka
name_original: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka
description:
Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka - the sixth and final part of the action and horror that was announced on January 5, 2023 about the adventures of an asshole from Velizh named Vadim Kulev aka Super Vadimka, he is considered a legend. Practically, the game is a 16-bit version in the style of the SNES masterpiece and contains about 100 levels and complex bloodthirsty bosses practically infected from.  Kulechkophobia contributing to the disease for the attack of the main character.

Unfortunately, the author of VadimBallzGame had to leave development because it contains about a lot of levels it is impossible to play many parts well, even this is interesting the sixth part which was developed in July 2022 ended in August 2022 and then it was decided to release the game in 2023 because every year the same thing is ugly.

After 1 year, it happened that Dr. Kulechka was released, well, he began to smash the world again and made scary monsters and robots returned to attack the main character of the supervadimka, well, the main character was left to freeze the camera of Dr. Kulechka, however, this is the last part of the game and Dr. Kulechka in the end you will see for yourself that he will be sent to prison for about 10 years.
